channel.title: BUpolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUpolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Republicans ask Chief Justice Roberts to reel in unruly federal judges
item.description: Two senior Republicans asked Chief Justice John G. Roberts Jr. on Wednesday to shut down lower federal judges who have been carping over how the court...

item.title: Voters on Tuesday rewarded Democrats who addressed economic costs. Hours later, Trump said he delivered an “economic miracle.”
item.description: A recent poll found a majority of Americans feel they’re spending more on groceries than they did a year ago.

item.title: Gallup poll finds record-high optimism about war on drugs
item.description: Record-high shares of Americans believe the country has made progress in the war on drugs, according to the latest Gallup polling released Wednesday.

item.title: Schumer flaunts Democrats' election night sweep as 'repudiation' of Trump and 'MAGA radicalism'
item.description: The top Senate Democrat said President Trump and his policies led to the GOP's sweeping defeat in Tuesday's election and said their losses should serv...

item.title: Supreme Court struggles with legality of Trump's tariffs, questions his authority to bypass Congress
item.description: The Supreme Court on Wednesday grappled with the legality of President Trump's unilateral decision to impose global tariffs, with skeptical justices q...

item.title: Schumer's nightmare scenario: Mamdani's win rekindles rumblings of AOC primary showdown
item.description: Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani's resounding election win is giving Senate Democratic leader Charles E. Schumer plenty to worry about.

item.title: Reaganomics in Jersey: Jack Ciattarelli has a supply-side dream if he’s elected governor this week
item.description: The Republican nominee has promised tax cuts and economic growth, but the numbers are fuzzy.

item.title: Chicago Mayor Dodges Question by Quibbling Over Term “Illegal Alien”
item.description: Chicago Mayor Brandon Johnson is happy to spend hundreds of millions of taxpayer dollars on benefits and services for illegal aliens. What he does not...

item.title: Gavin Newsom: What’s Three Lives and Another $200 Million Anyway?
item.description: In just the last two months, illegal aliens operating big rigs with California commercial driver’s licenses have cost six innocent motorists their liv...

item.title: DHS Launches Operation River Wall to Secure Rio Grande Valley
item.description: DHS’s Operation River Wall will surge U.S. Coast Guard assets to waterways at our southern border to target illegal immigration, transnational crimina...

item.title: FBI Arrests Palestinian Terrorist … in Louisiana

item.title: Portlandia is Nutty. Their News Media Thinks you are too.
item.description: Portland, Oregon, has been a sanctuary city since 2017. There is no ambiguity: “Sanctuary City” is even in the title of the ordinance. Despite what is...

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
